entry.data:
CLEAR
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE AROUND 30
SOUTH WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 50S
SOUTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY CLOUDY
NOT AS COOL WITH LOWS IN THE UPPER 40S
SOUTH WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH

PARTLY SUNNY IN THE MORNING, THEN CLEARING
HIGHS IN THE MID 60S
SOUTHWEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE UPPER 30S
NORTHWEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 50S

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE UPPER 40S
CHANCE OF RAIN 30 PERCENT

SHOWERS
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 60S
CHANCE OF RAIN 80 PERCENT

SHOWERS LIKELY
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE UPPER 50S
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT

PARTLY SUNNY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS
HIGHS IN THE MID 60S
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE EVENING, THEN PARTLY CLOUDY AFTER MIDNIGHT
COOLER WITH LOWS IN THE MID 30S
CHANCE OF RAIN 30 PERCENT

data.HIGHS: SUNNY, COOLER WITH HIGHS IN THE UPPER 40S

entry.data:
MOSTLY CLEAR IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE MID 20S
